name: Wing Commander III: Heart of the Tiger
summary: Commander III: Heart of the Tiger (commonly abbreviated WC3, WCIII, or HOTT) is the critically acclaimed third main game in Chris Roberts' Wing Commander science fiction space combat simulation video game series, developed and released by Origin Systems.
info:
• 游戏类型: Space combat simulation
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: DOS and Macintosh: NA 1994, EU 1994. 3DO: NA 1995. PlayStation: NA March 28, 1996, EU March, 1996, JP September 6, 1996
